availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Constant Faire Humbert (Louisville, Kentucky, watchmaker)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, watchmaker. Native of Switzerland. Married to Florence Humbert. Father of Delia Humbert, Henry Humbert, Louisa Humbert, Emma Humbert, and August Humbert. Watchmaker in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1852. Watchmaker in Louisville in 1855. Secretary of the French Benevolent Society in Louisville in 1858. Watchmaker in Louisville in 1860. Watchmaker in Louisville in 1861. Watchmaker in Louisville in 1865.
